sentences.en: a preacher famous for her inspiring sermons
sentences.cn: 以发人深省的讲道出名的传道者

sentences.en: He possesses the quality of inspiring confidence.
sentences.cn: 他有本事能让别人信任他.

sentences.en: He would be inspiring young people to get into the political fray.
sentences.cn: 他会激励年轻人投身政治战斗。

sentences.en: His inaugural speech was very inspiring.
sentences.cn: 他的就职演说很鼓动人心.

sentences.en: His speech was inspiring and touched my heart.
sentences.cn: 他的发言鼓舞人心,动人肺腑.

sentences.en: King was a great orator and an inspiring leader.
sentences.cn: 金是伟大的演说家和鼓舞人心的领袖。

sentences.en: She was one of the most inspiring people I'veever met.
sentences.cn: 她是我曾见过的最能鼓舞人心的人之一。

sentences.en: The book is less than inspiring.
The building was awe-inspiring in size and design.
sentences.cn: 这座建筑的规模和设计气势宏伟。

sentences.en: The erupting volcano was an awe - inspiring sight.
sentences.cn: 火山爆发是使人畏惧的景象.

sentences.en: The higher we climbed, the more awe-inspiring the scenery became.
sentences.cn: 我们爬得越高，风景越是让人叹绝。

sentences.en: The inspiring call was issued by the President.
sentences.cn: 这鼓舞人心的号召是总统发出的.

sentences.en: The sound of martial music is always inspiring.
sentences.cn: 军乐声总是鼓舞人心的.

sentences.en: What an inspiring news this is!
sentences.cn: 这是多么鼓舞人心的消息 啊 !

words.tran_cn: 激发；鼓舞；启示；产生；使生灵感
鼓舞人心的；灌输的；启发灵感的
鼓舞；激发；使感悟（inspire的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 鼓舞人心的，启发灵感的
trans.tran_en: giving people a feeling of excitement and a desire to do something great

trans.tran_cn: 鼓舞；激发；使感悟（inspire的ing形式）
